quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us. – Socrates
fact: A shark is the only fish that can blink with both eyes.
joke: My wife is on a tropical fruit diet, the house is full of stuff. It is enough to make a mango crazy.
